name: Southport Lane
overview: Southport Lane is an independent private equity firm that invests in diverse business activities across multiple sectors. The firm’s primary holding is a reinsurance platform that allows for exposure to a portfolio of insurance risks through segregated account companies on a fully collateralized basis. A hallmark of Southport’s strategy is the ability to deliver highly innovative solutions to an increasingly complex investment environ. The firm was founded as a response to the rapidly changing structured investment landscape and increasing liquidity challenges facing institutions globally. The investment approach is one of collaborative alignment of long-term interests as opposed to contentious distressed opportunism.
